article_metadata.description: The cuts to the Internal Revenue Service's budget are deeper than most people think. Here are some overlooked effects.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: How the IRS budget cuts will affect taxpayers

article_metadata.sailthru.description: The cuts to the Internal Revenue Service's budget are deeper than most people think. The author describes some of the insidious effects they will have, which have gone overlooked.
